posts.post_title: FS: *** SOLD ***  Raw N172 Old Judge - Stump Weidman (Detroits), hands at chest #0483
posts.post_content:
*** SOLD ***  Raw N172 Old Judge - Stump Weidman (Detroits), hands at chest #0483 *** SOLD *** 

The item pictured is the item you will receive.

I will try to be as transparent and accurate as possible describing this card, flaws and all.  But it is possible I might miss something.  Just being honest, as oversights do happen even though we try not to make them.

Please make your own determination as to the severity of the flaws.  

I do not appreciate negative surprises with items I buy, and so I do not want you to experience such when purchasing this card.

Description:

Nice, clear image, with decent contrast.

Light crease beginning towards middle of top edge, extending downward towards hands.  Full extent of crease is more noticeable on the back, than it is on the front.

Ink on front of uniform. Small oval stain on back. Well rounded corners.

Miscellaneous dark mark(s) along front left border (half way down), and on back.

 ***SOLD *** Price:  $200, and I cover shipping via U.S.P.S. Priority Mail. *** SOLD ***

I would prefer payment via Paypal Family & Friends, but would accept check or money order (which must clear before I ship).

First person to contact me that they'll take it, and pays for it, gets it. 

Thanks
Vincent
.
.`

John,

Thanks for prompt payment.  Will get N172 Old Judge Weidman #0483 mailed via USPS Priority Mail to you on Monday morning, October 5.

Thanks again.
Vincent
